items.sentence: We probably don\'t have enough money to buy that.
Tom said something to Mary that I couldn\'t hear.
I wanted to talk to you because I need your help.
John isn\'t the kind of man who would betray you.
I\'ve met Tom\'s family and they seem to like me.
If we hadn\'t done that, somebody else would\'ve.
I don\'t think that they could understand French.
I don\'t understand the meaning of this sentence.
Tom could smell breakfast cooking in the kitchen.
I began to understand the reason why he hated me.
